name: Corn Salad with Lime Vinaigrette
author: Jen
summary: I threw this salad together with ingredients I had in my kitchen one evening. This light and tasty alternative to a regular salad will accompany Mexican dishes perfectly. This also works well served as a dip with tortilla chips and tastes even better a day after making it. Serve as a side dish or as a dip with chips and salsa.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1  jalapeno pepper, or more to taste, seeded and diced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Mix corn, tomatoes, avocado, onion, jalapeno pepper, and cilantro together in a bowl
Whisk olive oil, and lime juice together in a small bowl; drizzle over the corn salad
Season salad with salt and pepper
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate at least 30 minutes
